title: Node.js
description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime and is used for building applications. In the context of FiveM it is necessary to bundle resources into a single package that can be ran on both the server and client.

title: Overextended
description: Their projects will always remain free and open-source, with their core developers working voluntarily. If you love what they do and want to help them continue, why not show your appreciation with a donation?
